lore: No egg can escape the will of an Eggs Benedictator. Dressed in the finest colors and with an air of dignified simplicity, they lead their troops with a firm handâ€¦ or hard shell, into battle. Minimizing casualties is their goalâ€”if it's possible. Though it's a little tricky when your entire army is covered in shells that could break just by bumping into the kitchen counter.
menagerieDialog: (They're nestled together, occasionally emitting soft peeping sounds.)
We may look fragile, but we'll crack some skulls!
Don't let our appearance fool you. We've got a few tricks up our... well, you know.
Our shells are tougher than they look. Bring it on!
(They're rolling around erratically, narrowly avoiding collisions.)
name: Eggs Benedictator
